item.title: Daniel add a quote by Robert Jordan
item.description: "Duty is heavy as a mountain, death is light as a feather." -- Robert Jordan

item.title: Daniel add a quote by David Eddings
item.description: "I've looked at the world for quite a few years now and I've found that if I don't laugh, I'll probably end up crying." - Prince Kheldar of Drasnia" -- David Eddings

item.title: Daniel add a quote by R.A. Salvatore
item.description: "The parry is wrong." - Drizzt Do'Urden" -- R.A. Salvatore

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Daniel Calhoun
item.description: "All right, you mangy bag of bones. One of us will meet the Spirits tonight. - Danel Blackwalker" -- Daniel Calhoun

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Daniel Calhoun
item.description: "Demon, your reckoning has come. - Danel Blackwalker" -- Daniel Calhoun

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "Without new experiences, something inside of us sleeps. The sleeper must awaken." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Margaret Weis
item.description: "Hope is the denial of reality. - Raistlin" -- Margaret Weis
